name: Dungeon Petscort
description:
Defend a cute pet going out for a walk in the middle of a perilous dungeon. Don’t worry, nothing can hurt you, but your cute friend on the other hand isn’t as durable. Defend it as long as you can before getting overwhelmed!

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 with the theme: Keep it alive.

Controls:

WSAD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

F - Swap Weapons
